sentences.en: a middle manager in a computer company
sentences.cn: 一家计算机公司的中层管理人员

sentences.en: Charles has been promoted to general sales and marketing manager.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯被提升为市场营销总经理。

sentences.en: He has been a meticulous manager, a manager par excellence.
sentences.cn: 他是个十分细心的经理，出类拔萃的经理。

sentences.en: He joined Sanders Roe, moving on later to become General Manager.
sentences.cn: 他加入了桑德斯·罗公司，后来一路晋升至总经理。

sentences.en: His opportunity to re-establish himself had been nobbled by the manager's tactics.
sentences.cn: 他重新树立自己地位的机会因教练的战术而流产了。

sentences.en: I am the new manager and you will be working under me.
sentences.cn: 我是新任的经理，你们将在我手下工作。

sentences.en: I want the manager'sjob when he calls it a day.
sentences.cn: 等到经理不干了之后，我想接替他的位子。

sentences.en: I wouldn't lay bets on his still remaining manager after the spring.
sentences.cn: 我看他的这个经理当不到春天之后了。

sentences.en: One can only pray that the team's manager learns something from it.
sentences.cn: 大家也只能希冀球队教练从中汲取教训。

sentences.en: She resolved to report the matter to the hospital's nursing manager.
sentences.cn: 她决定把这件事汇报给医院的护士长。

sentences.en: Sometimes, the bank manager just doesn't see it your way.
sentences.cn: 有时银行经理和你看问题的角度就是不一样。

sentences.en: The manager asked him to hold on while he investigated.
sentences.cn: 经理让他稍等一会儿，他去调查一下。

sentences.en: The team was given a roasting by manager Alex Feguson.
sentences.cn: 这个团队遭到了亚历克斯·费格森经理的严厉批评。

sentences.en: The United manager was to be seen frantically signalling to McClair.
sentences.cn: 一会儿可以看到曼联主教练拼命地朝麦克莱尔示意。

sentences.en: When the great man arrived, the club's manager personally escorted him upstairs.
sentences.cn: 那位要人到达时，俱乐部经理亲自陪他上楼。

sentences.en: You should have written to the area manager again.
sentences.cn: 你本应该再给地区经理写封信的。

words.tran_cn: 易管理的；易控制的；易办的
管理；管理人员；管理部门；操纵；经营手段
操纵；给…配置人员；使增强勇气；在…就位

phrases.tran_cn: 基金经理，财务经理；基金管理人
人事经理；人力资源经理；行政经理
职业经理人；专业管理者
高级管理人员，高级经理

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to manage part or all of a company or other organization
